about_the_game:
This high-octane, all original soundtrack is a perfect companion for anyone taking the first step on their journey to become legend!

The soundtrack has been split in two parts, Disc 1 being the perfect way to remember your journey across Rondelia in Goons: Legends & Mayhem's story mode. On the other hand, Disc 2 focuses on the game's multiplayer mode, making it the perfect collection of music heard during your sleepless nights trying to win "just another match".

Main Composer
Dave Gagné

Guest Composer
William Dakin (DOKI DOKI) for "Big Kerfuffle in Little Rondelia" and "The Origins of Evil" tracks

Additional Musician
Jérémie Hagen-Veilleux
